name: 2024 6th International Conference on Resources and Environmental Research
content: Paper Publishing: Papers submitted to ICRER 2024 will go through peer reviewing process by international experts. Selected papers will be included in Springer Book Series Environmental Science and Engineering (ISSN: 1863-5520), which will be submitted to EI Compendex, Scopus, SCImago and other major databases for indexing.
organizers: Department of Civil Engineering, the University of Hong Kong
